Class picture.ColorVector 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----picture.ColorVector
public class ColorVector
extends Object
implements Parsable
This parses a color vector of the form <1,1,1,1,1> with 3-5 elements, each of which is a real number from 0 to 1, with optional commas between them. The elements are red, green, blue, filter, transparency.

This code is (c) 1996 Leemon Baird <leemon@cs.cmu.edu>, http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~baird
The source and object code may be redistributed freely. If the code is modified, please state so in the comments.

Version:
1.0, 28 March 96
Author:
Leemon Baird

color
The color represented by the vector; missing elements are zero.
